column5: Hi all I'm looking for a quality ice fishing bungalow outfitter at north bay any advise?
Glen echo would be my first choice..New owners (well kinda anyway) nice huts..They will look after you

I got back Wed. from Rob Hyatt Outdoors.Nice bungalos, good operator.Very helpful.Stopped by a couple times a day to see if we needed anything.Offered to move us to day huts but we were happy where we were.I'll go back.
South Shore Ice Condos, IMHO best outfitter on the lake.
Used Glen Echo last year, would definetly use them again. They aim to please!  This year we are trying Anglers Haven w/o of Feb 12th, only to try someone new.
We just came back from Idle Tyme Fish Camp, we will be going back for the 4th time, excellent service with Shawn and Terra.
Couldn't agree more, Rob has treated us extremely well every time we've been up there. How was the bite phiphntek? Darcy
We used Anglers Haven in the past and were very pleased with them, huts were beautiful, service was excellent!  I would go back there anytime.
nothing to write home about but we did manage 4 walleye,couple dozen perch about 10 herring and a handful of pike.Nothing of any size
